quoteText:
You promise to provide us with accurate, complete, and updated registration information about yourself.
You may not (i) select or use as your username a name of another person with the intent to impersonate that person.
or (ii) use as your username a name subject to any rights of a person other than you without appropriate authorization.
or (iii) use as your username a name that is otherwise offensive, vulgar or obscene.
title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
tosdr.tldr: IFTTT Doesn't ask for a real name
